patthana15.11:1.1: Hetuṁ sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.11:2.1: Hetuṁ asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.11:3.1: Nahetuṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanahetu nanevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
